price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߲߫ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߬ ߕߊ ߸ ߞߍ߫ ߜߟߌߟߌ ߣߌ߫ ߖߐ ߘߴߌߓߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߤߌߡߊ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
